servinfo.title: Tail Light Relay, Headlight Relay Inspection

s1.ptxt: Remove tail light relay (1), headlight low beam relay (2) and/or headlight high beam relay (3).
Check that there is no continuity between terminal “3” and “4”. If there is continuity, replace relay.
Connect battery positive (+) terminal to terminal “2” of relay and battery negative (–) terminal to terminal “1” of relay.
Check continuity between terminal “3” and “4”. If there is no continuity when relay is connected to the battery, replace relay.
